verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found a friend
Who is all to me
His love is ever true
I love to tell
How He lifted me
And what His grace can do for you

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Saved
By His pow'r divine
Saved
To new life sublime
Life now is sweet
And my joy complete
For I'm saved saved saved

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He saves me from
Every sin and harm
Secures my soul each day
I'm leaning strong
On His mighty arm
I know He'll guide me
All The way

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When poor and needy
And all alone
In love He said to me
"Come unto Me
And I'll lead you home
To live with Me eternally"
